resources.string: Recover your contacts quickly and safely by correctly answering security questions.
Your account has been recovered, now you can chat privately and securely with your contacts.
Enter your Password. You are one step away from recovering your account. Enter your account recovery password number.
Security questions. You are closer to recovering your account, please help us confirm your identity. Answer the following security questions correctly
